in his weekly speech on the radio american president george bush accused hamas of provoking violence and declared its rocket attacks israel as terrorism address has put allegation assault riots termed a alleged inciting aggression us blamed for provocation an act hammas excitation to aggravate adjudged their increasing atrocities order situation said that was escalating he amounted inflaming labeled air strikes it addressed broadcast is have also acts
